articles.title: Vodacom has spent R1.7 billion on batteries in the past two years - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Vodacom Group CEO, Shameel Joosub says the mobile operator has spent R1.7 billion on batteries as a response to load shedding. Rampent battery theft has, however, created another problem.
articles.content:
• Vodacom has spent R1.7 billion in the past two years.
  • This move was a response to the energy crisis.
  • Though this investment has paid off, battery theft has become an issue.
